plugins.verifyConditionsCmd: echo 'Verifying build environment...' && npx ng version
plugins.prepareCmd: echo 'Updating library version to ${nextRelease.version}' && npm run update-lib-version ${nextRelease.version} && echo 'Verifying source update:' && cat projects/ng-apexcharts/package.json | grep version
echo 'Building ng-apexcharts...' && ng build ng-apexcharts && echo 'Verifying built version:' && cat dist/ng-apexcharts/package.json | grep version

plugins.publishCmd: echo 'About to publish:' && cat dist/ng-apexcharts/package.json | grep -E '"version|"name' && cd dist/ng-apexcharts && npm publish
